api_list.api_description: Get settings of a specific app by app_id.

required_parameters.name: app_id
required_parameters.description: The app ID of the third-party application.

api_list.api_description: Fetch jokes based on category, filters, and other parameters.

query: Can you tell me the settings of the app with app_id 123 on Barter, and also fetch a funny joke for me?
Find all available trading cards on Barter.vg and tell me what joke categories are available on JokeAPI.

api_list.api_description: Get information about a user by their user_id.

required_parameters.name: user_id
required_parameters.description: The hex ID of the barter.vg user.

query: I need to get the details of user 'a1b2c3' on Barter.vg, and also find out what blacklist flags are present in JokeAPI.

api_list.api_description: Retrieve supported languages for jokes and system messages.

query: Could you show me all the downloadable content available on Barter.vg? Also, list the supported languages for jokes on JokeAPI.
